message.body: So far I'm getting good response about 4-7 pm
I just saw Hugo he didn't know about tonight!
O no! Is he coming now?
No! He said he's no cool enough. No seriously he has to practice. I felt so badly. I just assumed he was coming or playing!
Im a big jerk! I focused all my advertising on facebook and he doesnt do facebook
Me neither. That's what I told him :). He seemed hurt at first then fine. He's sweet. I told him we love having him at rehearsal
